name: Waluigi Pinball
overview:
Did you ever feel like NES Pinball could be improved somehow?

Did that way of improvement involve 110% more Waluigi?

If so this is the hack for you! Everything has been replaced with Waluigi, from the seals, penguins, and chicks on the main table to Mario and the Princess in the bonus stage. All the palettes have been reworked as well to fit the Waluigi theme.
